Name: Baikazi Kweterana Group
description:
Xaviour is a Ugandan living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is aged 54 years. He owns drug shops, selling both human and veterinary medicines. His profession as a nurse led him to start up this business, having failed to get formal employment. 

Xaviour wants to take a loan to buy drugs to resell. He is a member of Baikazi Kweterana, a group where members guarantee each other to get a loan since they cannot pledge securities.
